name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Body and Hand Lotion, Moisturizer for Women, 7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1), with Essential Oils for Indulgent Moisturization White
reviews: I have never seen this particular Jergens lotion in the stores. I love citrus smells ( this has a few other scents by the way). It's nice & creamy which I'm pleased about because there is a difference between cream & lotion. I hate when I buy a cream & it's thin like a lotion. This says " triple butter" but it also says " oil" so I took a chance. It's perfect for me, if you want the creamier/ thicker kind. It's very good. Check it out for the different scents. This one (citrus) is really nice without being overbearing & the price is good.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 March 2024

name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Body and Hand Lotion, Moisturizer for Women, 7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1), with Essential Oils for Indulgent Moisturization White
reviewer: Love jergens. I think it's the best lotion on market. Someone gave me some for Christmas and I really think it's best for my problematic dry skin. No one ever talks about it but it's the best. Eucalyptus very fresh smelling and nice.
reviews: Best product for my problematic extreme dry skin. Someone gave me another jergens for Christmas and I knew them it was the best fragrance and best for me of all I've tried on the market. reviews: This is just one of the newer lotion scents from Jergens. Eucalyptus Mint, and I love it. The lotion is rich and keeps my skin soft these Winter months.  The scent is so luxurious and relaxing.  I have this item on recurring order.

name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Body and Hand Lotion, Moisturizer for Women, 7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1), with Essential Oils for Indulgent Moisturization White
reviews: I used to buy the body butter from Tree Hut for my mother for a few years, & she loved it because of the fact that her skin stayed moisturized for at least 24 hours after she applied it.  Unfortunately, Tree Hut changed their formula, so I've been on the lookout for a body butter that has a similar effect.  I found the Jergen's one through another app, & decided to buy it.  So far, my mother really seems to like it.  It's definitely helped w/ the rough patches on her arms, & she loves the scent.  Bonus, it's not greasy at all, & doesn't leave a gross residue behind.  Highly recommend this product.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 November 2023

name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Body and Hand Lotion, Moisturizer for Women, 7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1), with Essential Oils for Indulgent Moisturization White
reviews: I have never seen this particular Jergens lotion in the stores. I love citrus smells ( this has a few other scents by the way). It's nice & creamy which I'm pleased about because there is a difference between cream & lotion. I hate when I buy a cream & it's thin like a lotion. This says " triple butter" but it also says " oil" so I took a chance. It's perfect for me, if you want the creamier/ thicker kind. It's very good. Check it out for the different scents. This one (citrus) is really nice without being overbearing & the price is good.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 March 2024

reviews: This is just one of the newer lotion scents from Jergens. Eucalyptus Mint, and I love it. The lotion is rich and keeps my skin soft these Winter months.  The scent is so luxurious and relaxing.  I have this item on recurring order.

name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Body and Hand Lotion, Moisturizer for Women, 7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1), with Essential Oils for Indulgent Moisturization White
reviews: I used to buy the body butter from Tree Hut for my mother for a few years, & she loved it because of the fact that her skin stayed moisturized for at least 24 hours after she applied it.  Unfortunately, Tree Hut changed their formula, so I've been on the lookout for a body butter that has a similar effect.  I found the Jergen's one through another app, & decided to buy it.  So far, my mother really seems to like it.  It's definitely helped w/ the rough patches on her arms, & she loves the scent.  Bonus, it's not greasy at all, & doesn't leave a gross residue behind.  Highly recommend this product.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 November 2023
